data.name: PersonalMissionAwardView/bottomTabs/awards/additionalAwards
data.value: Rewards for completion of all missions with honors

data.name: PersonalMissionAwardView/subTitle
data.value: Click your nickname to select and equip a badge.

data.name: PersonalMissionAwardView/title/perfect
data.value: You received badges for completion with honors!

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item0/descr
data.value: Please welcome a new type of mission that can be completed over a series of battles, instead of just one battle.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item1/descr
data.value: Now the progress towards personal missions can be monitored in a battle. This option is currently available only for the Second Front campaign.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item2/descr
data.value: In the Second Front campaign, the missions are now distributed by formations, not by vehicle type.

data.name: detailedView/tooltips/additionalConditions/body
data.value: This is your objective in battle that you must fulfil in order to receive the additional reward for completing the mission with honors.

data.name: detailedView/tooltips/commonConditions/body
data.value: This is your objective in battle that you must fulfill in order to receive the main reward for completing the mission.

data.name: detailedView/tooltips/holdAwardSheetBtn/body
data.value: Click to commit an order to the mission and complete the primary condition.

data.name: detailedView/tooltips/holdAwardSheetBtn/disabled/body
data.value: To receive orders, complete with honors the last missions in each set within any operation.

data.name: detailedView/tooltips/retryBtn/body
data.value: Click to improve the result by completing the primary and secondary condition.

data.name: detailedView/tooltips/returnAwardListBtn/body
data.value: Click to complete the primary and secondary condition. If you complete the mission with honors, you will retrieve your order.

data.name: detailedView/tooltips/startBtn/body
data.value: Click to start the mission. Complete the conditions and claim your reward.

data.name: fourFreeSheetsObtainedPopup/descr1
data.value: Commit 4 orders to the %(questName)s mission and receive the missing vehicle component.

data.name: fourFreeSheetsObtainedPopup/descr2
data.value: Retrieve %(pawnedCount)s orders from the mission, in order to commit 4 orders to the %(questName)s mission and receive the missing vehicle components.

data.name: freeSheetObtainedPopup/descrLeft
data.value: You can use orders to complete any mission in a set.

data.name: freeSheetObtainedPopup/descrRight
data.value: Complete with honors all last missions in all sets.

data.name: freeSheetPopover/freeSheetsInfo/descr
data.value: Received for completing the last mission in a set.

data.name: freeSheetPopover/pawnedSheetsInfo/descr
data.value: To retrieve a committed order, re-complete the mission with honors.

data.name: freeSheetPopover/pawnedSheetsInfo/descr/noOne
data.value: You can use orders to complete any mission in a set.

data.name: operationUnlockedWindow/awardText
data.value: Congratulations! You can now proceed to completing the %(title)s operation.

data.name: operationUnlockedWindow/descr
data.value: Press %(label)s to select a mission and try to claim a new reward.

data.name: statusPanel/status/allDone
data.value: All missions for %(vehicleClass)s have been completed

data.name: statusPanel/status/allExcellentDone
data.value: All missions for %(vehicleClass)s have been completed with honors

data.name: statusPanel/status/noVehicle
data.value: Unavailable: no suitable vehicles for the %(vehicleClass)s set

data.name: tankmoduleTooltipData/help/body
data.value: Can be received for fulfilling the primary conditions of the last mission in the %(vehType)s set.

data.name: tankmoduleTooltipData/info
data.value: This component is required to receive the %(vehName)s

data.name: tankwomanTooltipData/advantages/brotherhood
data.value: The Brothers in Arms perk trained to 100%.

data.name: tankwomanTooltipData/advantages/nation
data.value: You can select a nation, vehicle type, and major qualification trained to 100%.

data.name: tankwomanTooltipData/advantages/newPerk
data.value: One more skill or perk of your choice trained to 100%.

data.name: tankwomanTooltipData/desc/body
data.value: Can be received for fulfilling the primary conditions of the last mission in each set.

data.name: useAwardSheetWindow/descr
data.value: Complete the primary conditions of the mission:

data.name: useAwardSheetWindow/info
data.value: Complete the mission with honors to retrieve an order.

data.name: useAwardSheetWindow/locked
data.value: Complete all missions in the set to retrieve orders.

data.name: useAwardSheetWindow/noVehicle
data.value: Vehicles required to retrieve the order: %(vehicleClass)s.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item0/blocks/0/descr
data.value:
Missions, the conditions of which should be fulfilled during one battle.
Fulfil the primary condition to complete the mission. You receive additional rewards for fulfilling both the primary and secondary mission conditions.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item0/blocks/1/descr
data.value:
Mission progress in all battles is added together.
The progress towards the completion of the primary condition will be multiplied by a particular coefficient after completion of the secondary conditions in a battle. Complete secondary conditions the indicated number of times to receive the reward.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item0/blocks/2/descr
data.value:
The missions can be completed over a particular number of battles. If the condition is not fulfilled, the progress will be reset, and you will have to start over again.
The secondary condition that provides rewards is similar to the primary one, but requires a much higher completion result.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item0/innerDescr
data.value: All missions have a specific completion condition based on a particular operation.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item0/warning
data.value: When changing/cancelling a mission of a particular type, all its progress will be reset, and you will have to start all over again.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item1/blocks/0/descr
data.value:
The progress towards missions of the Second Front campaign is displayed in the battle interface.
Remember that the progress towards particular conditions is calculated after the end of a battle. Some missions can be completed only on particular vehicle types, with no nation restrictions; the other missions require vehicles of particular nations for completion.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item1/blocks/1/descr
data.value:
Particular missions have additional restrictions that should be considered in a battle:
Certain time for fulfilment of conditions (or their parts). Limitation on the minimal value: for example, causing less than the required damage will result in zero progress towards the main condition, regardless of the actual amount of damage caused.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item1/blocks/2/descr
data.value:
The screen with the detailed description of the currently active mission can always be opened in a battle by pressing the Tab key.
Therefore, you can always check the mission description when in a battle if you forget a particular condition.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item1/innerDescr
data.value: The progress towards missions can be monitored when in a battle.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item2/blocks/0/descr
data.value: Particular missions can be completed only on a specific type of vehicle (the model and nation are not counted).

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item2/blocks/1/descr
data.value:
Some missions require vehicles of specific nations, with no restrictions on types. All missions are distributed into 4 formations:
Union: U.S.S.R., China. Bloc: Germany, Japan. Alliance: U.S.A., U.K., Poland. Coalition: France, Sweden, Czechoslovakia, Italy.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item2/blocks/2/descr
data.value:
Each operation has its own requirements for the minimum vehicle tier used to complete missions:
StuG IV: Tier IV-X vehicles. T28 HTC: Tier VX vehicles. Excalibur: Tier VI-X vehicles. T 55A: Tier VI-X vehicles. Object 260: Tier VI-X vehicles. Chimera: Tier VII-X vehicles. Object 279 (e): Tier VIII-X vehicles.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item2/blocks/3/descr
data.value: All missions can be completed only in the Random Battles mode and its types.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item2/innerDescr
data.value: The mission campaigns provide both common conditions and limitations that will be applied to a player during the completion of missions.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item2/warning
data.value: Please carefully study the requirements of each mission.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item3/blocks/0/descr
data.value:
The main rewards are the unique vehicles that are awarded only for the completion of missions. Each campaign has its own rewards:
Long-Awaited Backup: Stug IV, T28 HTC, T 55A, Object 260. Second Front: Excalibur, Chimera, Object 279 (e).

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item3/blocks/1/descr
data.value:
Each award vehicle has specific parts. Collect all the parts to receive the vehicle:
Componentsawarded for the completion of missions in the Long-Awaited Backup campaign. Blueprintsawarded for the completion of missions in the Second Front campaign.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item3/blocks/2/descr
data.value:
A unique crew member that has the Brothers in Arms perk trained to 100% and provides a female voiceover for game events (when appointed the vehicle Commander).
When recruiting, you can select the nation, qualification, and vehicle for this crew member, who will be trained to 100% for free.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item3/blocks/3/descr
data.value: In addition to vehicles, you can also receive other valuable rewards for the completion of missions.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item3/descr
data.value: In the Second Front campaign, for the completion of each last mission in a set, you receive one of five blueprints for the award vehicle.

data.name: PersonalMissionFirstEntryView/item3/innerDescr
data.value: Complete missions to receive rewards and unique vehicles.

data.value: The staging ground for the landing and advancing of the Bloc forces.

data.name: alliance/2/details
data.value: The staging ground for the landing and advancing of the Alliance forces.

data.name: alliance/3/details
data.value: The staging ground for the landing and advancing of the Coalition forces.

data.value: Operation missions can be completed only in vehicles of specified nations.

data.name: chainTooltipData/description/text/alliance3
data.value: Operation missions can be completed only in vehicles of specified nations.

data.value: Complete conditions in %(count)s battles in a row

data.name: conditions/unlimited/label/main
data.value: Complete the primary condition over any number of battles
